note.p: Daughter of William Wilson and his wife Lydia Jane Shepley, who was the sister of Susannah Mary Shepley (Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/178/34/21)). Married August Wilhelm von Hofmann in 1856.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1578/209/18), 1871 (RG10/178/34/21)
London, England, marriages and banns, 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 April 2013)
